catering services

Whether you are planning an intimate dinner party, a larger event or require a chef to cater for your holiday, Seaside Catering will design, shop for and create food that will enhance your experience and thrill your guests.

event catering

Food is an integral part of any special occasion - it can make or break an experience.

Whether you are planning a sumptuous wedding or a luxury corporate retreat we have got you covered! At Seaside Catering, we know how important food is. We will work with you before your project to insure you have the menu you want, honoring the very special place food has at the heart of any occasion.

Your experience will be enhanced and your guests will be thrilled with our innovate cooking style, dedicated service and enthusiasm.

private house catering

Multi-day catering that frees up your time.

Who wants to be the one stuck in the kitchen cooking, washing up, and cleaning the kitchen while the rest of the party relaxes, switches off from work and enjoys themselves? We do!

Whether you are planning a long weekend or a monthâ€™s family retreat at your home or getaway, we will work with you to design your daily menu, arrange the shopping, prepare your meals and keep the kitchen ship shape to our professional standard; allowing you to relax and just enjoy yourself and entertain your guests.
